headline: Flames Turn Trees Into Embers on Kilimanjaro, Imperiling Diverse Ecosystem
text: NAIROBI, Kenya — As fires swept up the slopes of Mount Kilimanjaro, Africa’s tallest mountain, for the fifth day on Thursday, hundreds of volunteers from local villages joined firefighters racing to stop a blaze threatening to ravage one of the world’s richest and most diverse ecosystems.
snippet: Strong winds and dry weather have hampered efforts to extinguish the spreading blaze on Africa’s highest peak.
